participant_1.background:
I play ping pong.
I love chocolate bars.
I play the violin and the guitar.
I speak chinese.
My father is an electrician.

participant_2.background:
My dream in life is to work from home.
I dye my hair every three months.
I went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.
I have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games.

content.text: I want to work from home and have enough money to travel the world.
That sounds like a great goal! Do you have any idea what kind of work you would like to do from home?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about becoming a freelance writer or web designer.
Those are both great options! I know a few people who work from home as freelance writers and they love it.
That's good to hear! I'm glad to know that it's a viable option.
What made you decide to go to school to be a veterinarian?
I've always loved animals and I thought it would be a great career. But after a few years of school, I realized that I didn't enjoy it as much as I thought I would.
I'm sorry to hear that. But it's good that you realized it before you wasted too much time on it.
Yeah, I'm glad I didn't finish the program.
So, what have you been doing since then?
I've been working in customer service for a few years, but I'm not really happy with it.
I can understand that. Customer service can be a tough job.
So, what are you thinking about doing next?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going back to school to get a degree in business.
That sounds like a good idea! I know a lot of people who have gone back to school and found it to be a great experience.
I'm glad to hear that. I'm looking forward to it.
